Chris Dollin wrote:

 > Usually I run the tests for
> the bit I'm tinkering with at a moments provocation and run the full suite
> when I reach some kind of anchor point - the necessity for loading or
> unloading tea, the final new feature working, or Oh My Stars Has It Been
> An Hour?!

This seems to be a common pattern. I recommend adding the repeated 
automated build (like CruiseControl), as a way of eliminating the 
possibility of not running all the tests for an hour.
